attributes.action: bring in realistic measures to encourage SME businesses to expand and help to grow the economy, instead of disincentivising them through tax.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Measures to encourage and help SME business should include:

1) Simplification of the tax system

2) Greater Access to funds & trade credit - make applying for funds less complex and time consuming

3) Give companies the ability to opt out of certain new regulations

4) Incentives to invest in business

government_responses.details:
You signed a petition asking the Prime Minister to "bring in realistic measures to encourage SME businesses to expand and help to grow the economy, instead of disincentivising them through tax."

The Prime Minister's Office has responded to that petition and you can view it here: 

http://www.number10.gov.uk/Page22927
